docs.text: Welcome to Charts This is a collection of helm charts that I've worked on for my Kubernetes cluster at home. Chart Layout volumes : creates a number of persistent volumes to be used by anybody in the cluster Automation There is a Makefile included that will help automate a number of the steps to publish the charts. Commands include: * doc : use MkDocs to publish to gh-pages branch
docs.title: Home
